content: this is a pattern for a big crochet doily table topper made with cotton thread size ten such as aunt lydia s and a steel hook 1 5 mm there are 34 rounds and the finished doily measures about 19 inches in diameter it s a pretty big size doily or table topper the pattern is written in english using us crochet terminology this pattern cannot be redistributed however you have the permission to sell finished items made from this pattern #pinwheel
